msg: * vector (ctors): Removed extraneous zeros from initializers.

author: mturyn
msg: Uncommented some code that had needed to be so for debugging the changes in style class handling.

author: mturyn
msg: Added machinery for "class" attribute.  Relatively simple, [add|remove]StyleState must do what it previously did with the
default style (e.g. "xapRadioButton") with a list of other style classes.
The only complication is for Label and decendant classes:  their substructure requires that we do things to
both the "root" dom node and the "contents" node...we should generalise this and put the necessary machinery
